cause.description:
Our vision is a community in which:
All pets are provided with adequate food, shelter, medical care, companionship and appropriate training
No adoptable pets are euthanized
All companion pets are spayed or neutered
All pets are wanted and considered a part of the family
The Humane Society is considered the ‘pet source of choice’ for responsible pet owners.
1. Promoting responsible pet care through public education and services
2. Working to reduce unwanted pet populations
3. Providing humane care to abandoned, injured or relinquished animals
4. Finding homes for adoptable pets
cause.mission: The Humane Society of Kent County is dedicated to the protection and care of all animals. We give voice to creatures who cannot speak for themselves.
cause.name: Kent County Humane Society
